text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Observation I0..*ObservationMeasurements and simple assertions
must-have-focus-or-specimen-invariant: Either `focus` OR `specimen` MUST be populated
code S1..1CodeableConceptType of observation (code / type)
Required Pattern: At least the following
coding1..*CodingCode defined by a terminology system
Fixed Value: (complex)
system1..1uriIdentity of the terminology system
Fixed Value: http://loinc.org
code1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
Fixed Value: 21889-1
subject S1..1Reference(Cancer Patient Profile)The patient whose tumor was measured.
focus S0..1Reference(Tumor Profile)Identifies a tumor that has NOT been removed from the body
effective[x] S0..1dateTime, Period, Timing, instantClinically relevant time/time-period for observation
method S0..1CodeableConceptMethod for measuring the tumor
Binding: Tumor Size Method Value Set (extensible)
specimen S0..1Reference(Tumor Specimen Profile)Identifies a tumor that has been removed from the body
Slices for component S1..*BackboneElementComponent results
Slice: Unordered, Open by pattern:code
component:tumorLongestDimension S1..1BackboneElementLongest tumor dimension (cm or mm)
code S1..1CodeableConceptType of component observation (code / type)
Required Pattern: At least the following
coding1..*CodingCode defined by a terminology system
Fixed Value: (complex)
system1..1uriIdentity of the terminology system
Fixed Value: http://loinc.org
code1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
Fixed Value: 33728-7
Slices for value[x] S0..1QuantityActual component result
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueQuantity 0..1QuantityActual component result
Binding: Tumor Size Units Value Set (required)
dataAbsentReason S0..1CodeableConceptWhy the component result is missing
component:tumorOtherDimension S0..2BackboneElement2nd or 3rd tumor dimension (cm or mm)
code S1..1CodeableConceptType of component observation (code / type)
Required Pattern: At least the following
coding1..*CodingCode defined by a terminology system
Fixed Value: (complex)
system1..1uriIdentity of the terminology system
Fixed Value: http://loinc.org
code1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
Fixed Value: 33729-5
Slices for value[x] S0..1QuantityActual component result
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueQuantity 0..1QuantityActual component result
Binding: Tumor Size Units Value Set (required)
dataAbsentReason S0..1CodeableConceptWhy the component result is missing

Documentation for this format

name: VGHKSTumorSize
title: VGHKS Tumor Size Profile
description: Records the dimensions of a tumor

element.short: The patient whose tumor was measured.
element.definition: The patient whose tumor was measured. SHALL be a `Patient` resource conforming to `CancerPatient`.

element.short: Identifies a tumor that has NOT been removed from the body
element.definition: Reference to a BodyStructure resource conforming to Tumor.
element.comment: Use **only** when the tumor **has not** been removed from the body. If the tumor has been removed, use `specimen` instead and leave `focus` empty.

element.short: 首次顯微鏡檢證實日期，使用 effectiveDateTime (LF.dmconf)

element.comment: Tumors are typically measured via gross pathology after excision, or via diagnostic imaging or physical exam prior to removal. If `specimen` is set, `method` is expected to be a "gross pathology" code. If `focus` is set, `method` is expected to be a type of diagnostic imaging or physical exam.

element.short: Identifies a tumor that has been removed from the body
element.definition: Reference to a Specimen resource conforming to TumorSpecimen.
element.comment: Use **only** when the tumor **has** been removed from the body. If the tumor has been not removed, use `focus` instead and leave `specimen` empty.
